name: Kids Memory Game
description:
Kids Memory Game:
- is a card game with images of various birds that will test your memory. The object of the game is to find paired cards. This can be difficult enough because the game is exclusively about birds. With Kids Memory Game you can train your memory and your child's memory.
This is a card game that trains your memory. The game has a training mode with bird cards and sound descriptions of them. And several levels of difficulty. Easy, Medium, and Hard.
